str2: No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.
From paideuo; tutorage, i.e. Education or training; by implication, disciplinary correction.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of a primary verb, doko dok'-o of the same meaning; to think; by implication, to seem.
Joy, gladness, a source of joy. From chairo; cheerfulness, i.e. Calm delight.
To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: From para and eimi; to be near, i.e. At hand; neuter present participle time being, or property.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
Pain, grief, sorrow, affliction. Apparently a primary word; sadness.
Lastly, afterward, later. Neuter of husteros as adverb; more lately, i.e. Eventually.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From apo and didomi; to give away, i.e. Up, over, back, etc.
Peaceable, disposed to peace, profitable. From eirene; pacific; by implication, salutary.
Probably from the base of harpazo; fruit, literally or figuratively.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Dative Masculine Plural
str2: To train by physical exercise; hence: train, in the widest sense. From gumnos; to practise naked, i.e. Train.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Feminine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
